official_title: A bill to amend title 13 of the United States Code to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce responsibility for preparing the Quarterly Financial Report which is currently performed by the Federal Trade Commission.

summary.text: Transfers to the Secretary of Commerce all functions, rights, and responsibilities relating to the quarterly financial statistics report program currently vested in the Chairman of the Federal Trade Commission.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13 of the United States Code to transfer to the Secretary of Commerce responsibility for preparing the Quarterly Financial Report which is currently performed by the Federal Trade Commission.
